languages.text: "Беды следуют за вами по пятам, но мы придумаем, как с этим справиться. Обещаю".

traits.locale_text: "Беды следуют за вами по пятам, но мы придумаем, как с этим справиться. Обещаю".

languages.text: "Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."
languages.original_text: "Беды следуют за вами по пятам, но мы придумаем, как с этим справиться. Обещаю".

traits.locale_text: "Woes follow you, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."
"Woes follow you, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."
"Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."
"Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."
"Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."

languages.text: “你的旅途充满了祸患，不过我们会想办法克服它们。我保证。”
languages.original_text: "Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."

traits.locale_text: “你的旅途充满了祸患，不过我们会想办法克服它们。我保证。”

languages.text: «Aunque los problemas siguen sus pasos, encontraremos la forma de superarlos. Lo prometo».
languages.original_text: "Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque los problemas siguen sus pasos, encontraremos la forma de superarlos. Lo prometo».

languages.text: 「苦難はカシア殿の歩みを悩ませるかもしれないが、我々はそれを打ち破る方法を見つけるだろう。約束する」
languages.original_text: "Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."

traits.locale_text: 「苦難はカシア殿の歩みを悩ませるかもしれないが、我々はそれを打ち破る方法を見つけるだろう。約束する」

languages.text: "Nöte leiten Eure Schritte, aber wir werden einen Weg finden, das zu beheben. Versprochen."
languages.original_text: "Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."

traits.locale_text: "Nöte leiten Eure Schritte, aber wir werden einen Weg finden, das zu beheben. Versprochen."

languages.text: « Votre chemin est pavé d'infortunes, mais nous trouverons un moyen de vous conduire vers des jours meilleurs. Je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: "Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."

traits.locale_text: « Votre chemin est pavé d'infortunes, mais nous trouverons un moyen de vous conduire vers des jours meilleurs. Je vous le promets. »

languages.text: "Keder peşini bırakmıyor. Ancak bunun üstesinden gelmenin bir yolunu bulacağız, söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "Woes dog your steps, but we will find a way to defeat them. I promise."

traits.locale_text: Adımlarını keder izliyor ama bunun üstesinden gelmenin bir yolunu bulacağız, söz veriyorum."
